{"city": "Richmond", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "960 S 47th St,", "phone": "510-215-4884", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Richmond Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Booker T. Anderson Center , 960 S 47th St, Richmond , 2nd & 4th Saturday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Kennedy High School , 4300 Cutting Blvd, Richmond , 1st & 3rd Saturday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Enter down S 45th St, Richmond. Please bring two bags with handles. Living Hope Neighborhood Church , 2800 Rheem Ave, Richmond , 1st & 3rd Saturday 10:00-11:00am.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Nevin Community Center , 598 Nevin Ave, Richmond , 2nd & 4th Tuesday 10:00-11:00am.
							Please bring two bags with handles. North Richmond Missionary Baptist Church , 1427 Fred Jackson Way, Richmond , 1st & 3rd Thursday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Sojourner Truth Presbyterian Church , 2621 Shane Dr, Richmond , 1st & 3rd Saturday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Veteran's Memorial Hall , 968 23rd St, Richmond , 1st & 3rd Monday 12:30-2:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. West Contra Costa Adult Education , 5625 Sutter Ave, Richmond , 1st & 3rd Monday 9:30-11:00am.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Mobile Pantry Distribution Families and individuals can pick up FREE fresh produce, proteins, dairy and a variety of nonperishable food once or twice a month. Please choose ONE location. North Richmond Missionary Baptist Church , 1427 Fred Jackson Way, Richmond , 2nd Friday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Richmond Civic Center , 24 Barrett Ave & 25th St, Richmond , 2nd & 4th Thursday 12:00-1:30pm.
							Please park in the parking lot and line up at the Red Umbrella. Please bring 2 - 3 reusable bags for produce. Southside Church of Christ , 1501 Florida Ave, Richmond , 4th Tuesday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Bay Area Rescue Mission , 123 Macdonald Ave, Richmond , Monday-Saturday 1:00-2:30pm.
							Call for special holiday distributions. Phone: 510-215-4884 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Beacon Light Seventh-day Adventist Food Pantry , 607 S 19th St, Richmond , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 9:00-10:00am. Phone: 510-234-7771 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Corrine Sain Senior & Family Community Center , 515 Silver Ave, Richmond , Tuesday - Friday 9:00-11:00am. Phone: 510-221-2538 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Ephesians Community Development Center (Drive-Thru), 2887 Foothill Ave, Richmond , Wednesday 11:00am-1:30pm. Phone: 510-778-1528 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. LifeLong William Jenkins Health Center , 150 Harbour Way, Richmond , Wednesday 10:00-12:00pm. Phone: 510-981-4100 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Living Hope Neighborhood Church , 2800 Rheem Ave, Richmond , Wednesday & Friday 12:00-1:00pm. Phone: 510-233-7353 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Men and Women of Valor , 1350 Kelsey St, Richmond , Tuesday 11:00am-2:00pm. Phone: 510-255-7603 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Multicultural Institute , 3600 MacDonald Ave, Richmond , Thursday 11:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 510-847-1479 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. New Gethsemane COGIC , 2100 Roosevelt St, Richmond , Wednesday 10:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 510-620-9628 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. North Richmond Missionary Baptist Church Pantry , 1427 Fred Jackson Way, Richmond , Wednesday 10:30-11:30am.
							The Pantry and Soup Kitchen run at the same time. Neighbors can get their pantry food and a hot meal all at once. Phone: 510-232-7751 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Providence Baptist Church , 314 S 12th St, Richmond , Thursday 11:00am-3:00pm. Phone: 510-234-1162 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Richmond Emergency Food Pantry , 2369 Barrett Ave, Richmond , Tuesday & Friday 11:00am-2:00pm.
							Proof of address is Required. Bring ID for proof. Phone: 510-235-9732 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Sojourner Truth Presbyterian Church (Drive-Thru), 2621 Shane Dr, Richmond , 3rd Saturday 1:00-3:00pm. Phone: 510-222-2020 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. John Missionary Baptist Church , 662 S 52nd St, Richmond , Tuesday 12:00-1:00pm. Phone: 714-323-6152 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Support Life Foundation: Richmond , 1110 36th St, Richmond , Friday 10:00-11:00am. Phone: 510-541-6293 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. True Fellowship Baptist Church , 1213 Fred Jackson Way, Richmond , 1st of every month 11:00am-12:00pm
3rd Saturday 11:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 510-215-8322 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Partner Soup Kitchen Soup kitchens provide FREE meals to anyone who comes in during meal hours. Menus vary, although each soup kitchen tries to offer balanced meals. Bay Area Rescue Mission , 200 Macdonald Ave, Richmond , Monday-Sunday 6:00-7:45am, 11:00am-1:00pm and 4:00-5:45pm. Phone: 510-215-4884 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. GRIP Souper Center , 165 22nd St, Richmond , Monday-Sunday 11:30am-12:45pm. Phone: 510-233-2141 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. North Richmond Missionary Baptist Church - Soup Kitchen , 1427 Fred Jackson Way, Richmond , Wednesday 10:30-11:00am.
							A hot meal is provided in a to-go box. Phone: 510-232-7751 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Corrine Sain Senior & Family Community Center , 515 Silver Ave, Richmond , 2nd & 4th Friday 10:30-11:30am. Southside Church of Christ , 1501 Florida Ave, Richmond , 2nd & 4th Friday 10:30-11:30am.
							This food distribution is located in the back parking lot of the church. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
Fairfield, CA 94533 GET HELP Find Food CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Contact Us 855-309-FOOD (3663) info@foodbankccs.org How to Help Ways to Give Donate Food Volunteer Advocate Become a Partner Agency Food Bank Updates Blog Events Newsroom Newsletter Sign-up Careers Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Linkedin 501(c)(3) Organization | Federal Tax ID# 94-2418054 Copyright © 2025 Cookie Settings This institution is an equal opportunity provider | Site Map | Privacy Policy Website Design and Development by MIGHTYminnow", "latitude": 37.918543633036, "longitude": -122.326858761873, "source": "food_bank_of_contra_costa_and_solano_ca", "food_bank": "Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano"}
